channel.title: JROCK: Nutty a Hermit
channel.itunes:subtitle: You know you want to be nutty about Jrock!
channel.itunes:author: Kimicho AKA Hachi

item.title: Episode 14: Randomness is how I throw my parties
item.description: Hey people. I've finally updated and with some news too. But you'll have to listen to find out what my news is. Wowo~ I'm really surprised how many page views, downloaders, and all that other jazz I got in the...er... 8 months I've been gone. ^^ I know for sure then that this podcast will most likely go over the bandwidth again. So if ANYONE comments and wants to listen, I just might host it on another server.
item.dc:creator: Kimicho AKA Hachi
item.itunes:summary:
Hey people. I've finally updated and with some news too. But you'll have to listen to find out what my news is.
Wowo~ I'm really surprised how many page views, downloaders, and all that other jazz I got in the...er... 8 months I've been gone. ^^
I know for sure then that this podcast will most likely go over the bandwidth again. So if ANYONE comments and wants to listen, I just might host it on another server.

item.title: NOTICE
item.description:
Not a update, more along the line of a note. But there is one song featured because I felt bad.
- Chao+System - Monstropolis
item.dc:creator: Kimicho AKA Hachi

item.title: Episode: Gotta do what I have to
item.description: New podcast.. to tired to type. Maybe video podcast next time, not featuring me though since I don't have my webcam yet. Must sleep... Zzzzzz........... -snores-

item.title: Episode 11: Yo ho yo ho! A random life is the only life for me!
item.description: Heyo! Miss me? Today's show is kinda random and no real theme involved. Heh. I'm too lazy. Well now that I think about it. I guess it could be somewhat about Gazette's new single and pv. Music: Duck no Magical Adventure - AnCafe Blood - Mika Nakashima (upcoming NANA movie) Bite to all - Gazette Cassis - Gazette Toguro - Gazette Last Bouquet - Gazette Mystery song~ Talked about: - Why I'm late? - Random things about my day, of course. - Fangirling.. is that even a word? - A bit of ranting. Love me? Hate me? Leave a comment.
item.dc:creator: Kimicho AKA Hachi
item.itunes:summary:
Heyo! Miss me? Today's show is kinda random and no real theme involved. Heh. I'm too lazy. Well now that I think about it. I guess it could be somewhat about Gazette's new single and pv.
Music: Duck no Magical Adventure - AnCafe Blood - Mika Nakashima (upcoming NANA movie) Bite to all - Gazette Cassis - Gazette Toguro - Gazette Last Bouquet - Gazette Mystery song~
Talked about: - Why I'm late? - Random things about my day, of course. - Fangirling.. is that even a word? - A bit of ranting.
Love me? Hate me? Leave a comment.

item.title: Episode 10: Can't keep me quiet
item.description: Yo yo! Here is the break down of the information that I do know of the bands that did perform at Jrock Connection. Information on: -Chaos+System -Xenophobia -Karma-Shenjing There is also a concert review on each of the perfomers. And random talk about Jrock news that I could think of off the top of my head... Plus ramblings about Xmas. Songs including: -Virgin Mary - Aliene Ma'riage -Rinne (remix) - Karma-Shenjing -6bit - ISABELLE -Winter Fall - L'arc~en~Ciel
item.dc:creator: Kimicho AKA Hachi
item.itunes:summary:
Yo yo! Here is the break down of the information that I do know of the bands that did perform at Jrock Connection.
Information on: -Chaos+System -Xenophobia -Karma-Shenjing
There is also a concert review on each of the perfomers. And random talk about Jrock news that I could think of off the top of my head... Plus ramblings about Xmas.
Songs including: -Virgin Mary - Aliene Ma'riage -Rinne (remix) - Karma-Shenjing -6bit - ISABELLE -Winter Fall - L'arc~en~Ciel

item.title: Episode 09.5: Need more research
item.description: It's really short since I need some more time for research. But there are two songs that are worth listening to in this mini show.
item.dc:creator: Kimicho AKA Hachi

item.title: Episode 09: Back from a busy holiday
item.description: Howdy everyone! Looks who's back. Today's podcast is featuring Vidoll. 1. Mommy x Daddy 2. heroin 3. agoraphobia and.. 4. Chigire by Gazette But this show also features a bit of my own personal rambling about Jrock connection. Ps. I'm a dumbass. I still don't know how to upload the cover art icon thing. Can anyone tell me how you do it? Or where to click?
